heroSub: This Cookie Policy explains how Elite Capital (DIFC) Limited (“Elite”, “we”, “our”, or “us”) uses cookies and similar technologies when you access or interact with our website.

content.title: 1. Use of Cookies
para: A cookie is a small text file that is stored on your browser or device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide reporting information. When you access our website, we may use cookies or other similar technologies to distinguish you from other users and enhance your browsing experience.

We do not use cookies to collect personal data unless you voluntarily provide such information (e.g., by submitting a form on the website). Where cookies collect data that could identify an individual, we treat such data as personal data and handle it in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws, including DIFC Law No. 5 of 2020.

content.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
para: We may use the following categories of cookies on our website:

list1.title: Strictly necessary cookies
detail: These cookies are essential to enable you to navigate the website and use its features. Without these cookies, certain services you request may not be possible.

list1.title: Performance and Analytics Cookies:
detail: These cookies collect aggregated and anonymous data on how visitors use the website, such as which pages are visited most often, and whether users receive error messages from web pages. These cookies help us improve the performance and functionality of our website.

list1.title: Functionality Cookies:
detail: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your language preferences) and provide enhanced, more personalized features.

content.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
para: We may allow selected third parties to place cookies on our website for performance and analytics purposes. These third-party service providers are required to comply with applicable data protection laws and are contractually bound to process any personal data only as instructed by us.

content.title: 4. Consent and Control
para: By continuing to browse our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. You may choose to disable or block cookies at any time by modifying your browser settings. However, please note that if you choose to disable all cookies, some parts of our website may not function properly.
For detailed instructions on how to manage cookie preferences in your specific browser, you may refer to:

content.title: 5. Updates to this Policy
para: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in the law, technology, or our practices. Any updates will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information.

content.title: 6. Contact Us
para: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our use of cookies, please contact:
